about_the_game:
The official soundtrack of the narrative RPG I Was a Teenage Exocolonist. Ambient electronic and acoustic instruments blend into two hours of chill and beautiful tunes by various artists including C418, scntfc, A Shell in the Pit, Gabriel Koenig and others.

Includes both MP3 and FLAC versions.

Also includes the official Exocolonist artbook in regular and high-resolution PDFs.
detailed_description:
The official soundtrack of the narrative RPG I Was a Teenage Exocolonist. Ambient electronic and acoustic instruments blend into two hours of chill and beautiful tunes by various artists including C418, scntfc, A Shell in the Pit, Gabriel Koenig and others.

Includes both MP3 and FLAC versions.

Also includes the official Exocolonist artbook in regular and high-resolution PDFs.
